name: My Caligula
detailed_description:
Story
My Caligula follows the Roman Emperor Caligula and his sisters as they navigate college life in the modern day. In this visual novel your choices will determine if you live or die as well as your love interest.

Gameplay
The game is built on choices that will have an impact on the gameplay. Be careful not to get too crazy or your life in the modern age will be short indeed.
Who will you bond with? The crazy Drusilla? The mysterious Livilla? Or maybe the bossy Agrippina? No matter your choice you are in for the ride of your life.
Because after all, who had a better life then Caligula?
